body: For the record, there is an implementation in [THNN/THCUNN of `SpatialDepthWiseConvolution`](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/torch/lib/THCUNN/generic/SpatialDepthWiseConvolution.cu) which are mostly performing a for loop over the number of groups, so it shouldn't be any more efficient than our current implementation using `groups=nInputPlane`. But we could maybe modify it to use `bmm` instead of `mm`, as in the Chainer example?
